tasks.task: Prepare and ferment garlic for immune boosting purposes.
subtasks: Sterilize jar (if necessary) with hot soapy water.
Store jar in a cupboard, turning occasionally for two weeks.
Process cloves into a paste using a food processor.
Secure jar lid loosely (for burping) and store in a dark place.
Use the finished paste as a rub or spread.

tasks.task: Understand the benefits of fermented foods.
subtasks: Learn about the gut-brain axis and probiotic benefits.
Store labels on ferments for future reference.
Experiment with various ingredients (ginger, turmeric, etc.) in honey.
